en_us: A custom terrain expansion pack that makes biome specific caves and mineshafts
The world has modified block compositions.\n\nSome biomes have different blocks compared to normal worlds.
In the desert, sandstone and gravel generate instead of stone and gravel.\n\nIn snowy biomes, snow, ice, and white concrete powder can be found in caves.
Terracotta layers extend throughout the entire underground in badland biomes. Gravel cannot be found, but red sand patches takes their place.
